alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued June 15 at 3:53PM CDT until June 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 307 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 41 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OKLAHOMA CANADIAN CLEVELAND GRADY KINGFISHER LOGAN MCCLAIN OKLAHOMA POTTAWATOMIE IN EAST CENTRAL OKLAHOMA PONTOTOC SEMINOLE IN NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA BLAINE DEWEY ELLIS HARPER MAJOR WOODS WOODWARD IN SOUTHEAST OKLAHOMA ATOKA BRYAN COAL HUGHES JOHNSTON MARSHALL IN SOUTHERN OKLAHOMA CARTER GARVIN JEFFERSON LOVE MURRAY STEPHENS IN SOUTHWEST OKLAHOMA CADDO COMANCHE COTTON GREER HARMON JACKSON KIOWA TILLMAN IN WESTERN OKLAHOMA BECKHAM CUSTER ROGER MILLS WASHITA IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN TEXAS ARCHER BAYLOR CLAY FOARD HARDEMAN KNOX WICHITA WILBARGER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADA, ALTUS, ALVA, ANADARKO, ARCHER CITY, ARDMORE, ARNETT, ATOKA, BLANCHARD, BUFFALO, BURNS FLAT, CHEYENNE, CHICKASHA, CLINTON, COALGATE, CONCHO, CORDELL, CROWELL, DAVIS, DUNCAN, DURANT, EL RENO, ELK CITY, FAIRVIEW, FARGO, FREDERICK, GAGE, GEARY, GRANITE, GUTHRIE, HAMMON, HENNESSEY, HENRIETTA, HINTON, HOBART, HOLDENVILLE, HOLLIDAY, HOLLIS, KINGFISHER, KINGSTON, KNOX CITY, LAKESIDE CITY, LAVERNE, LAWTON, LEEDEY, LINDSAY, MADILL, MANGUM, MARIETTA, MOORE, MUNDAY, MUSTANG, NEWCASTLE, NORMAN, OKARCHE, OKEENE, OKLAHOMA CITY, PAULS VALLEY, PURCELL, QUANAH, RINGLING, RYAN, SAYRE, SCOTLAND, SEILING, SEMINOLE, SENTINEL, SEYMOUR, SHATTUCK, SHAWNEE, SHEPPARD AFB, SNYDER, SULPHUR, TALOGA, TEMPLE, THACKERVILLE, TISHOMINGO, TUTTLE, VERNON, VICI, WALTERS, WATONGA, WAURIKA, WEATHERFORD, WETUMKA, WEWOKA, WICHITA FALLS, WOODWARD, WYNNEWOOD, AND YUKON.
